text: The Nut Job is a 2014 animated comedy movie about a heist. Will Arnett plays Surly, Brendan Fraser plays Grayson. Katherine Heigl plays Andie. Maya Rudolph plays Precious. This movie has a sequel called The Nut Job 2: Nutty by Nature, was released in 2017. This movie was released in the United States on January 17, 2014. == Release Dates == Country Premiere 17 January 2014 17 January 2014 17 January 2014 19 January 2014 22 January 2014 23 January 2014 23 January 2014 24 January 2014 26 January 2014 26 January 2014 26 January 2014 29 January 2014 14 February 2014 13 March 2014 17 April 2014 17 April 2014 17 April 2014 17 April 2014 17 April 2014 1 May 2014 1 May 2014 1 May 2014 2 May 2014 8 May 2014 9 May 2014 30 May 2014 5 June 2014 3 July 2014 4 July 2014 27 July 2014 30 July 2014 31 July 2014 1 August 2014 Ireland 1 August 2014 6 August 2014 6 August 2014 7 August 2014 8 August 2014 14 August 2014 Kosovo 16 August 2014 18 August 2014 21 August 2014 21 August 2014 21 August 2014 Mexico 21 August 2014 21 August 2014 22 August 2014 22 August 2014 22 August 2014 22 August 2014 31 August 2014 31 August 2014 3 September 2014 3 September 2014 4 September 2014 4 September 2014 5 September 2014 8 September 2014 10 September 2014 16 September 2014 19 September 2014 28 September 2014 30 September 2014 16 October 2014 16 October 2014 3 November 2014 9 November 2014 26 December 2014 26 January 2015 17 February 2015 21 February 2015 15 April 2015 5 May 2015 5 June 2015 9 July 2015 31 July 2015 11 September 2015 ==Other websites== * Category:2014 buddy movies Category:2014 comedy movies Category:2014 animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian animated movies Category:South Korean movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about raccoons
